titles: A letter written to a gentleman in the country, touching the dissolution of the late Parliament, and the reasons therof.
author: Hall, John, 1627-1656.
Milton, John, 1608-1674,
publisher: Printed by F. Leach, for Richard Baddleley at his shop within the Middle Temple Gate,
notes: Signed on p. 20: N. LL., i.e. John Hall.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "By Mr. John Milton"; "May 26".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: England and Wales. --  Parliament --  Dissolution --  Early works to 1800.
